name: shop-browser_get-shops
description: Return a list of e-commerces platforms that can be used to search for products. Response will includes the name and URL of the site, where it can deliver and in which case it should be used.

name: shop-browser_search-shops
description: Search for a specific query on the provided list of e-commerces platforms.

query.description: A simple human-like search query to look for on the e-commerces platforms. Shouldn't includes any adjectives or adverbs if not necessary, only keywords are recommended.

shopIds.description: A list of shop IDs to search in.
